name: Military Sniper War - Army Attack to kill & Shoot the Enemies
name_original: Military Sniper War - Army Attack to kill & Shoot the Enemies
description:
Military Sniper War is a army base game where you have a duty as a Elite Sniper. You army base is under attack by the another country army and you have to defend the military base and shoot all the enemies with a modern sniper.

Play your part to save the your country army from the other country occupied. Real heroes stand for a cause and always help the suppressor. Play as a hero to shoot the enemies. Shoot the enemies with sniper gun. The addictive gameplay and increasing difficulty level will keep you stuck to the game for hours making you relax.

The prominent features of the game:
• Realistic Sniper Shooting
• Addictive gameplay
• High Definition graphics
• Detailed Aiming
• Absolute zoom in / zoom out during play
• Increasing difficulty
• Sniper shooting missions
